resources.string:
National capital state, New Delhi standing on the west bank of Yamuna river has got the spell to charm locals and travelers alike. Heritage lovers have Humayun’s Tomb, Qutub Complex, Old Fort, Red Fort and other historic marvels carved by the maharajahs. Shopaholics have a real reason to loosen the pockets; Palika, Sarojini Nagar, Lajpat Nagar etc. Delhi’s India Gate, Supreme Court, Lotus Temple and Jama Masjid have set a new parameter in the brilliance of architecture. 

Delhi is fit for budget travelers, luxury travelers, kids and solo backpackers. 
Delhi is also called "Dilli Dilwalon ki" meaning Delhi belongs to the large-hearted. 

Languages: Hindi,English,Punjabi
Best time to visit: October to March
STD Code: 011-
